alert.note: Alert for Shelby (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 18 at 5:51PM CDT until July 18 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR TIPTON...NORTHWESTERN FAYETTE AND NORTHEASTERN SHELBY COUNTIES... At 550 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Dixonville, or 7 miles northwest of Millington, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Bartlett, Millington, Cordova, Meeman Shelby Forest State Park, Memphis, Lakeland, Arlington, Munford, Brighton, Ellendale, Dixonville, Eads, Tipton, Atoka, Mason, Gallaway, Gilt Edge, Burlison, Braden and Lenow. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
